FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.ifmmSeq AND ifmmDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ifmmSeq = #{shValue} AND ifmmName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue},'%') AND ifmmId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM infrMember WHERE ifmmId = #{ifmmId}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrMember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
